directions.step: Peel eggplant and slice into 1/8 in. slices, salt and let drain for 30 min. Pat dry.
Dip eggplant slices into eggs and then into crumbs
Heat 1/4 c. oil in large fry pan and saute eggplant slices until golden brown sides
Continue cooking eggplant until all is sauteed, using additional oil if needed.

Place half the eggplant slices in 9 X 13 pan, sprinkle with 1/3 parmesan, 1/2 oregano, and 1/3 mozzarella. Cover with half the tomato sauce. Repeat layers, top with last of parmesan and mozzarella. Bake in preheated 350 oven 30 min, or until bubbly.
